edu.depaul.armada.dao

Interface ContainerLogDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContainerLogDaoHibernate

    public interface ContainerLogDao
    Used for CRUD operations associated with ConatainerLogs Created by jodavidson on 1/25/15. Completed by jplante

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteOldData(int interval)
      Deletes data older than given interval in hours specified in the parameter it is passed.
      java.util.List<ContainerLog> findWithContainerId(long containerId)
      Returns a List object with a containerId field matching the one specified as a parameter.
      java.util.List<Metric> findWithContainerIdAndPeriod(long containerId, int periodCount, java.lang.String fieldToAverage)
      Returns a List from all of the containers with a specified ID, within a a particular amount of time, and with an average of a specified field.
      java.util.List<Metric> getContainerCounts(int periodInHours)
      Returns a List from all of the containers with data within a specified amount of time.
      double getContainerLogAvgCpuUsage(long containerId)
      Returns a double of the average CPU used by a Container.
      double getContainerLogAvgDiskUsage(long containerId)
      Returns a double of the average disk space used by a Container.
      double getContainerLogAvgMemUsage(long containerId)
      Returns a double of the average memory used by a Container.
      java.util.List<Metric> getStateCounts(long memThreshold, long cpuThreshold, long diskThreshold, int periodCountInHours)
      Returns a List from all of the containers with state fields greater-than or equal to certain user defined parameters.

    • Method Detail

      • findWithContainerId

        java.util.List<ContainerLog> findWithContainerId(long containerId)
        Returns a List object with a containerId field matching the one specified as a parameter.
        Parameters:
        containerId - id of the parent container of logs we want
        Returns:
        list of logs belonging to a container

      • getContainerLogAvgMemUsage

        double getContainerLogAvgMemUsage(long containerId)
        Returns a double of the average memory used by a Container. It accepts a long as a parameter, then passes that to another method to find the average, which is then returned.
        Parameters:
        containerId - container for which we want average memory usage
        Returns:
        average of memory usage

      • getContainerLogAvgCpuUsage

        double getContainerLogAvgCpuUsage(long containerId)
        Returns a double of the average CPU used by a Container. It accepts a long as a parameter, then passes that to another method to find the average, which is then returned.
        Parameters:
        containerId - container for which we want average cpu usage
        Returns:
        average of cpu usage

      • getContainerLogAvgDiskUsage

        double getContainerLogAvgDiskUsage(long containerId)
        Returns a double of the average disk space used by a Container. It accepts a long as a parameter, then passes that to another method to find the average, which is then returned.
        Parameters:
        containerId - container for which we want average disk usage
        Returns:
        average of disk usage

      • findWithContainerIdAndPeriod

        java.util.List<Metric> findWithContainerIdAndPeriod(long containerId,
                                                    int periodCount,
                                                    java.lang.String fieldToAverage)
        Returns a List from all of the containers with a specified ID, within a a particular amount of time, and with an average of a specified field.
        Parameters:
        containerId - id of the container to which the logs belong
        period - used to determine the time period for which we want to collect logs
        Returns:
        list of logs

      • getStateCounts

        java.util.List<Metric> getStateCounts(long memThreshold,
                                      long cpuThreshold,
                                      long diskThreshold,
                                      int periodCountInHours)
        Returns a List from all of the containers with state fields greater-than or equal to certain user defined parameters.
        Returns:
        list of counts of how many containers are in given state in given interval

      • getContainerCounts

        java.util.List<Metric> getContainerCounts(int periodInHours)
        Returns a List from all of the containers with data within a specified amount of time.
        Parameters:
        periodInHours - number of metrics
        Returns:
        list of containers per hour

      • deleteOldData

        void deleteOldData(int interval)
        Deletes data older than given interval in hours specified in the parameter it is passed.
        Parameters:
        interval - interval in hours
